item.title: [GenAI Placeholder] Anomaly Detection
item.description: Note: this post was created by GenAI (Claude) for temporary filler content. The 3 AM Wake-up Call It was 3 AM when my phone buzzed with an urgent alert: our main API endpoint was experiencing unusual latency spikes. But here’s the twist - our newly implemented anomaly detection system caught this before any user reported issues. By the time I checked the dashboard, our automated remediation had already scaled up the necessary resources.
